db:abstract.db:para: The SatelliteInfo example shows how the available satellites at the user's current position and marks the satellites currently contributing to the GPS fix as pink.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app TARGET = satelliteinfo
QT += quick positioning
SOURCES += main.cpp \ satellitemodel.cpp
HEADERS += \ satellitemodel.h
OTHER_FILES += \ satelliteinfo.qml
RESOURCES += \ satelliteinfo.qrc
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/positioning/satelliteinfo INSTALLS += target
